response_json.question_text: A 50 percent degree of reaction axial flow turbine operates with a mean blade speed of 180 m/s. The flow leaves the stator and enters the rotor at an angle of 60 degrees to the axial direction. The axial velocity is 150 m/s, and remains constant throughout the stage.
